rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg001
rows.name:
This looks like a good spot
to take a break...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg002
rows.name: Hikari, can I ask you something?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg003
rows.name:
What?
Why so formal all of a sudden?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg004
rows.name:
I was reading through my old
journal entries. We used to spar quite
often during training, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg005
rows.name:
And apparently
I always came out on the losing end...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg006
rows.name:
It can't be helped.
You were getting pretty close, but
I guess it's a difference in ability.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg007
rows.name: So, what about it?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg008
rows.name:
Well, you see, according to the records,
it seems like I won against you
just once.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg009
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg010
rows.name:
The details aren't written down,
but beating Heaven's Holy Grail
is quite the achievement, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg011
rows.name:
So, I was thinking
I'd like to know how I won...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg012
rows.name: ...That never happened.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg013
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg014
rows.name:
That record is a lie!
I never lost to you!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg015
rows.name:
I'm not making this up!
It's right there in my journal.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg016
rows.name:
When exactly did this happen?
Which fight?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg017
rows.name:
At the training camp near
the Iiran border, on the last day
of exercises.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg018
rows.name:
...That never happened!
It's completely made up!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg021
rows.name: How should I counter-argue?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg019
rows.name: Are you saying my records are wrong?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg020
rows.name: Don't make it sound like I'm a liar!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg101
rows.name: That fight doesn't count!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg102
rows.name: What do you mean it "doesn't count"?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg103
rows.name:
That time was right after
I had a practice match with Kasumi, but
you insisted, so I went along with it.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg104
rows.name: So it doesn't count as a real match!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg105
rows.name:
I see.
You don't want to admit your loss?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg106
rows.name: I'm telling you I didn't lose!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg107
rows.name: You're being so childish.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg108
rows.name:
Besides, in all the other matches,
you only won by a small margin, right?
Nothing to boast about.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg109
rows.name:
Oh?
Is that sharp tongue of yours
also recorded in your diary?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg110
rows.name:
You've got nerve!
Why don't we test it right here,
right now?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg111
rows.name:
Hold on, you two!
Let's not get carried away!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg112
rows.name: No fighting, please!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg113
rows.name: We're not fighting.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg114
rows.name:
Exactly.
We're just sparring.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg115
rows.name:
Get ready!
It's time to settle this rivalry
once and for all!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg116
rows.name:
This time,
I'll make you clearly
understand that I'm superior.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg117
rows.name:
Please wait!
Can someone stop them?!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg201
rows.name: Isn't that right?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg202
rows.name:
You deliberately challenged me
when I was exhausted!
That's nothing but a cheap shot.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg203
rows.name:
You have some nerve...
It's written that our matches were
always close and neck-and-neck.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg204
rows.name:
We were practically equal in skill.
Is it really so unbelievable that
I'd win once in a while?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg205
rows.name:
Hold on...
why would you even keep
such detailed records of our matches?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg206
rows.name:
Let me borrow that diary.
I'll correct it!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg207
rows.name:
No way!
Don't you dare tamper with my journal!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg208
rows.name: Um, excuse me...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg209
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg210
rows.name: What is it?!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg211
rows.name:
Don't you think this argument
is getting out of hand?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg212
rows.name:
We're not fighting!
If you don't want to get hurt, go away!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg213
rows.name:
Exactly!
This is just our way of bonding!
Stay out of it, Byakko!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg215
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi, today you'll finally see
just how powerful I really am!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg216
rows.name:
Hikari,
you're the one who's going to be
embarrassed in front of everyone!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg217
rows.name:
...Well...
I guess this is their own
strange version of friendship...?
